name: tududi
description: Tududi is a self-hosted to-do and task tracking application with projects, lists, and priorities. It offers a simple, responsive web UI for managing daily tasks.
features: Task management: Create and organize tasks with titles, descriptions, and due dates.
Project organization: Group tasks into projects for better organization and focus.
Priority levels: Set task priorities to focus on what matters most.
List views: View tasks in lists organized by project, priority, or due date.
Task completion: Mark tasks complete and track your progress over time.
Simple interface: Navigate a clean, responsive interface designed for daily task management.
Due date tracking: Set deadlines and receive visual indicators for upcoming and overdue tasks.
Mobile-friendly: Manage tasks from any device with a fully responsive design.
Quick add: Create new tasks rapidly with minimal required information.
Search and filter: Find tasks using search and filter by project, priority, or status.
Privacy-focused: Keep all task data on your own server with complete control.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements for personal use.
